full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3933030696-Doc4158484767
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3933030696
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-26T14:00:00
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Offer Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites eligible bidders to submit proposals for the fabrication of four (4) 4ft x 8ft helicopter sling baskets and three (3) 4ft x 4ft helicopter sling baskets on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

**Requirements**

* The deliverables must be received on or before March 23, 2024.
* There are no security requirements associated with this solicitation of offers.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this solicitation is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

### Contact Information

For further information or questions regarding this tender, please contact:

Matthew Furlong (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: [Note the absence of a phone number in the original text, so none has been included here]
Email: matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

Access the official notice and solicitation package at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17244493?extsite=MTcyNDQ0OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Relevant Documents

Please see the official notice for details on required attachments and any additional documentation.

### Debriefing Request

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Please submit your request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that your bid was unsuccessful.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Whether a trade agreement applies to this specific bid will be determined on a case-by-case basis. Please consult with the
